Class
Description
CamelConfiguration
Class to configure the Camel application.
CamelRouteBuilder
 
Facade
This is the main entry point for multiplayer game.
FacadeImpl
This is the internal implementation of the facade, students should not use it directly for their assigment
Game
This class represents a game in the multiplayer environment.
Game.GameState
 
GameCommand
 
GameException
 
HostFacade
This facade interface allows the host to manage the game
InternalFacadePlumbing
This is more advanced interface to used for advanced game management.
PlayerFacade
This interface allows a player to join a game and interract with other players in a game
